headline: Jim Cramer on Constellation Brands: “Too Soon for Me, But I Don’t Think You’re Crazy If You Want to Start a Small Position”
summary: Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed, along with recent market rotation. Cramer showed mixed feelings around the stock during the episode, as he remarked: “I gotta tell you, Constellation Brands looks a heck of a lot more attractive here, down here, I should say, than a year ago. This […]
